column1: The WHO Regional Director for the Eastern Mediterranean, Dr Ahmed Al-Mandhari, has released a statement
on the status of the pandemic in the Region. He warns that cases in the region have increased during the past
three weeks and there is the risk cases will continue to increase as many countries ease restrictions. He
reiterated that every country’s best defense against COVID-19 is to find, isolate, test and care for every case
and to trace and quarantine every contact.
